release.action: Upgraded to org.openrdf:openrdf-sail-memory:2.0.1 to fix http://openrdf.org/issues/browse/SES-521
Changed NRL namespace from old (wrong) to new (right) 'http://www.semanticdesktop.org/ontologies/2007/08/15/nrl#'

Added new rule:
ppp nrl:inverseProperty qqq /\ rrr rdfs:subPropertyOf ppp /\ rrr nrl:inverseProperty sss -> sss rdfs:subPropertyOf qqq

Hacked Sesames ForwardChainingRDFSInferencer to additionally infer inverse triples based on the rule
Namespace: "nrl" = "http://www.semanticdesktop.org/ontologies/nrl/#"
Rule: xxx nrl:inverseProperty yyy /\ aaa xxx bbb -> bbb yyy aaa
